Book Two of the Billionaire Brothers Series

S. [Ann Cole]60-marian

Appetizer

Sweet SinsBy : S. Ann ColeAs [I]0-i sat in [the garden]391-the garden , [She]392-she said to me,“Taste and see . ”[392-she] [She]392-she was beautyShe was lovelyShe was everything to [me]0-i [She]392-she was mineShe was divineShe was everything to [me]0-i [She]392-she was loveShe was joyShe was everything to [me]0-i “ Taste and see , ”[392-she] said [she]392-she . From [her]392-she delicate hands , [I]0-i took … [I]0-i bit … [I]0-i tasted … What [I]0-i tasted was sin . [She]392-she smiled at [me]0-i , Knowing [she]392-she ’d winSatisfaction in [her]392-she grin Yet , [I]0-i bit again , And Again . Over eternal life , [I]0-i chose [her]392-she sweet sin . Because … [She]392-she was the sun , Had [me]0-i undone , [She]392-she was everything to [me]0-i [She]392-she was real , Made [me]0-i feel , [She]392-she was everything to [me]0-i Again [I]0-i bit , And then [I]0-i knew , With that last bite , [I]0-i knew … [She]392-she owned [me]0-i . Sweet sins … [She]392-she owned [me]0-i .

Preface‘Frailty , [thy]393-thy name is [woman]394-woman ’ has always been a line of [Shakespeare]62-shakespeare ’s Hamlet that [I]0-i detest . [I]0-i never even went about trying to understand why the word ‘ [woman]394-woman ’ was perpetually aligned and used in conjunction with the word ‘ weak’ . Were [women]396-women weak ? Were [they]396-women truly ? Were [women]396-women made to be submissive — [eventually?A woman]398-eventually?a woman can play the card of independence as well as [she]398-eventually?a woman wants , engulf [herself]398-eventually?a woman in all things ‘ manly ’ , prove equality and flaunt [her]398-eventually?a woman ‘ strength ’ . But at some point , [she]398-eventually?a woman has to acknowledge the fact that [no mortal]399-no mortal will ever be able to reshape what [God]63-god has molded . It ’s said that [women]396-women were made to be submissive to [men]401-men . Was even given stern commandments to do so . [Women]396-women were made for [men]401-men . Not the other way around . After all , were [she]396-women not literally made from [a man]404-a man ’s rib ? How , then , can [a woman]405-a woman ever say that [she]405-a woman is equal to , or more than , [a man?For every woman who holds that notion]406-a man?for every woman who holds that notion , the realization comes one day that [she]405-a woman is n’t . That day when [she]405-a woman bumps foreheads with [that one person who has the power to make [her]405-a woman melt , dissolve , frazzle just by breathing , [she]405-a woman knows]407-that one person who has the power to make her melt , dissolve , frazzle just by breathing , she knows . For [every woman]408-every woman , there is [that one man]409-that one man . [That one man who wields ultimate power over [her]405-a woman , no matter how strong , independent or in control [she]405-a woman thinks [she]405-a woman is]410-that one man who wields ultimate power over her , no matter how strong , independent or in control she thinks she is . [That one man]409-that one man , [she]405-a woman soon finds out , is whose rib [she]405-a woman was made from … This [I]0-i know . Yet , [I]0-i still ponder , is [frailty woman]412-frailty woman ’s name ?

[I“Oh]0-i [my]405-a woman God , [Axia]80-axia , please tell [me]405-a woman [you]80-axia ’re at the gym?”Trudy[405-a woman] had left [the gym]413-the gym no less than fifteen minutes ago and headed straight for work , so as [she]405-a woman gushed down the receiver the minute [I]0-i answered it , [I]0-i wondered why [she]405-a woman was phoning [me]0-i instead of working . “Wherever else would [I]405-a woman be?”“Well[405-a woman] [I]0-i need a favor . Please . It seems when [we]414-we were playing tug – of - war with [my]0-i handbag earlier , [my]0-i damned thumb - drive fell out . And that thumb - drive has the freakin ’ presentation [I]0-i ’ve been working on all month , and the meeting for that presentation , [Axia]80-axia , is now ! ” [she]405-a woman intoned . “[80-axia] Please , can [you]0-i find it and get here in , like , five minutes ? Do that crazy driving thing that [you]0-i always do to get to [places]415-places fast . ”“‘Sakes , [Trudy]65-trudy , [you]0-i ’re so messy . [You]0-i ’re always losing something . And do n’t [you]0-i know [you]0-i should always have more than one storage for [important docs]3196-important docs ? How uncoordinated [you]0-i can be ! [I]0-i just stepped off the treadmill and [I]0-i ’m half - dressed and icky an — ”[0-i] “ Goddammit , [Axia]80-axia ! Will [you]0-i just shut [your]0-i ever - berating pie - hole and find the damned drive ? [I]0-i do n’t care how sweaty or busy [you]0-i are . If [you]0-i ’re not here in ten minutes , then [our]3197-our friendship is terminated!”The[0-i] line went dead . [I]0-i scowled at the Blackberry in [my]0-i hand . Only [Trudy]65-trudy could get away with addressing [me]0-i in such a manner . [She]65-trudy was [[my]0-i best friend]416-my best friend and [I]0-i did n’t feel the compulsion to control [her]65-trudy . True , [I]0-i might have gotten carried away with the berating , and was maybe just a weeny bit inconsiderate at [her]65-trudy desperation for [my]0-i aid . But [Trudy]65-trudy knew [me]0-i well , so [she]65-trudy no doubt had expected some shit - slapped answer from [me]0-i . Sweat dripped from [my]0-i face , and [my]0-i skin glistened from its sheen ; the results of a one - hour mountain climbing on the treadmill . Using [my]0-i towel to dry the sweat from [my]0-i face , [I]0-i went in search of the thumb - drive to help [[my]0-i damsel in distress]417-my damsel in distress . The bright orange thing was found sitting in solitude on a workout mat . [Trudy]65-trudy and [I]0-i had engaged in a tug - of - war over [her]65-trudy handbag in this vicinity when [I]0-i ’d caught [her]65-trudy nibbling on Snickers , which [she]65-trudy was prohibited from eating . [She]65-trudy ’d quickly tried to hide it in [her]65-trudy bag and that ’s when the tugging began . Wrapping [my]0-i fingers around the thumb - drive , [I]0-i rushed out of [the gym]413-the gym . When [Trudy]65-trudy called [me]0-i , the treadmill had barely come to a halt , so breathing was irregular and [I]0-i was entirely soaked with sweat and in need of a shower and proper attire , but [I]0-i had to get this cursed thing to [Trudy]65-trudy without delay . [I’d]0-i watched [her]65-trudy labor with the preparation of this presentation for over a month . But the presentation was the least of the matter . [She]65-trudy ’d tried for nigh six months to get [[her]65-trudy boss]419-her boss ’s ear to perk in interest of a new idea [she]65-trudy wanted to pitch . And [I]0-i was pretty sure that with [a company like that]420-a company like that , this was a [you]421-you - only - got - one - chance - to - prove - [yourself]421-you - to - [me]0-i opportunity for [Trudy]65-trudy . If [[her]65-trudy boss]419-her boss liked [her]65-trudy idea , well , [Trudy]65-trudy could become [a wealthy wench]423-a wealthy wench . [She]65-trudy had brilliant ideas , but in [a city like [San Francisco]1-san francisco that ’s teeming with [geniuses]425-geniuses]424-a city like san francisco that ’s teeming with geniuses , the opportunity wall was rather difficult to break through . Wearing only a pink tube top and a black workout capris with [my]0-i pink and white Shape - up sneakers , [I]0-i hopped into [[my]0-i jeep]426-my jeep and pressed it to [Coded Solutions]2-coded solutions . It was an eight - minute drive , but being [an aggressive driver]427-an aggressive driver , [I]0-i had the gift of getting to [[my]0-i destinations]428-my destinations in record time . [Patience]66-patience and [I]0-i were [vicious enemies]429-vicious enemies . In five and half minutes [I]0-i was in [the parking lot of [the building]431-the building]430-the parking lot of the building . [My]0-i body lunged from [the jeep]432-the jeep , leaving the engine on and car door open — no , [I]0-i was n’t worried about theft : [ghosts]433-ghosts knew who to shout “ boo ! ”[435-the receptionist] at — and rushed through the revolving doors of [the intimidating building]434-the intimidating building . Before [the receptionist]435-the receptionist could look up , [I]0-i spoke through labored breathing , “ [Trudy - ann Green]65-trudy . It ’s urgent . What [floor]3198-floor is [her]65-trudy meeting with [Mr. Nelson?”The[0-i] brunette receptionist]3199-mr. nelson?”the brunette receptionist scanned [my]0-i attire with a scowl , but then [she]435-the receptionist blinked at [me]0-i as if realizing somehow that [I]0-i was of no harm , and gave [me]0-i the information [I]0-i needed with an added “ Nice bod . ”The[435-the receptionist] elevator ride to [floor 42]436-floor 42 took forever , but it granted [me]0-i enough time to restore [my]0-i regular breathing pattern . When the doors opened , [I]0-i instantly became conscious of [my]0-i sparse attire when the air - conditioner whispered across [my]0-i bare flesh , turning [my]0-i nipples to hardened nubs under [my]0-i tube top . Oh dear , [I]0-i did n’t think this through . Were n’t [these people [freezing?The receptionist for [this floor]444-this floor]443-freezing?the receptionist for this floor]442-these people freezing?the receptionist for this floor apprised [me]0-i of [Trudy]65-trudy ’s whereabouts as [she]443-freezing?the receptionist for this floor made a sloppy attempt to conceal [her]443-freezing?the receptionist for this floor disapproval of [my]0-i attire . [Trudy]65-trudy glanced up and saw [me]0-i and [her]65-trudy shoulders visible relaxed , relief replacing [her]65-trudy frown . [She]65-trudy gestured for [me]0-i to hurry while [she]65-trudy grabbed the doorknob and opened it halfway . [The man]451-the man was too wealthy for [his]451-the man age , too crude for [his]451-the man status , and cocky enough to make [you]452-you detest [him]451-the man — well , at least that ’s what [I]0-i heard . [He]451-the man was known as [the ‘ wise - guy ’]453-the ‘ wise - guy ’ , with [his]451-the man never - failing ideas in the world of social networking and software creation . There stood [[San Fran]68-san fran ’s hottest , sexiest , wealthiest [Internet billionaire]455-internet billionaire]454-san fran ’s hottest , sexiest , wealthiest internet billionaire , [Lovello Nelson]69-lovello . Good thing [I]0-i was n’t into [men as pretty as this one]456-men as pretty as this one , because , [my]0-i oh [my]0-i , [the man]451-the man was delectable enough to eat . [He]451-the man had inky - dark hair with a natural unkempt flair to it , [his]451-the man jaws prominently squared and angular , [his]451-the man eyes were a mischievous slate - gray that were surrounded with curled lashes . But the highlight of [his]451-the man face was those amazing , impossibly perfect peach - colored lips . That ’s another thing [he]451-the man was famous for , more than [his]451-the man wealth and brains : [his]451-the man beauty . XVIII “ … [we]4191-we all come to the end of [our]4191-we lives as naked and empty - handed as on the day [we]4191-we were born . [We]4191-we ca n’t take [our]4191-we riches with [us]4191-we . XXVIOne hand went before the other , slicing through the water , propelling [my]0-i body forward . Reaching the end wall , [I]0-i flipped over and started another lap . This would be around the fiftieth lap since [I]0-i jumped off . With [my]0-i eyes and ears closed , [I]0-i could n’t see or hear anything , and that was [my]0-i goal . [I]0-i did n’t want to see . Did n’t want to hear . Nothing . Just to concentrate on moving [my]0-i body forward through this resistant source . At least it created the illusion of [me]0-i getting somewhere — even if it was just from one short point to the next and then back again , and again , and again . But outside of this source , even though [I]0-i walked and talked and tried that thing called ‘ moving on ’ , [I]0-i was n’t really getting anywhere . [I]0-i merely placed one foot before the next , carrying [my]0-i life on [my]0-i legs , but [I]0-i remained in the same spot , like walking on a treadmill . [I]0-i was n’t going anywhere . There was nowhere to go . There was nowhere [I]0-i wanted to go . It had been five weeks since that heart - wrenching night at [The Golden Seven]45-the golden seven . [Lovello]73-lovello and [I]0-i have n’t seen nor heard from [each other]592-each other since . [We]2550-we had a silent break - up . A break - up where no words were needed . No screaming or shouting or verbally abusing the other . It was just one of those break - ups where [we]2550-we both knew that that was it . It was over . The day after , [I]0-i packed [his]73-lovello belongings and called [[his]73-lovello housemaid]2551-his housemaid , [Rosa]212-rosa , over to get them . But [I]0-i hired securities to deliver [his]73-lovello 1.1 million dollar Chopard watch back to [him]73-lovello . Which was returned . And which [I]0-i ’d sent back . Yeah , [we]2550-we ’d engaged in a back and forth with that gift until [he]73-lovello finally gave up and kept it . Getting [him]73-lovello out of [my]0-i mind and heart was , well , impossible .
